response.overview: TWO CURRENTS confront each other to help the poor earth. The center of the confrontation is Avignon, on the day of the Premiere of the 'Three Musketeers' staged by Al, the Mafia boss. It is here that the seat of the clandestine organization is located and it is also here that the quiet rise of resistance takes place. The young scientist Julie, Mira, Yann, act...
response.title: L'internationale des fonctionnaires
